text: Angelina Jolie Begs Tom Ford For Help Resurrecting Her Career Angelina Jolie is ready to get her groove back and is enlisting fashion guru Tom Ford to help! “ With all the drama around her and Brad Pitt, Angelina feels like a huge outsider right now, and she knows Tom is the industry It Guy, ” tattles a fashion insider. Tom was the mastermind behind Gucci and Saint Laurent before launching his own line, and has gone on to direct two Oscar - nominated flicks, A Single Man and Nocturnal Animals.
